segments.advisor_message: Hey there, so uh, talking bout your health, how do ya feel these days?
segments.client_message: Well, ya know, I’ve been feelin alright, but I smoke like, uh, about 10 cigarettes a day, and I've been doin it since I was like, 18 or something.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, thanks for sharin that. And, uh, do ya need any long-term care or somethin?
segments.client_message: Nah, not really, I don’t think I need long-term care, but I don’t have a will or power of attorney set up either.
